name: Do Your Best, Happy!
description:
My dog Happy do his best to prevent sheeps from escaping from the fence!

Submission for the Tirjam #187. Theme is "Stay here forever". All programming and assets, except for the sheeps sounds, were made in three hours.

Controls:

- WASD to move Happy

Credit:

- Desing, development and assets by plasol

- Sheep sounds from freesound.org
